title: TUI refactor: Extract long event handlers
description: handle_input_mode (420 lines) and handle_selector_mode (155 lines) need extraction. Split into handle_*_completer_key() methods and per-selector-page handlers.

logs.msg: Reviewed - command/file completers have different accept behaviors (full replace vs @query replace). Extraction would require careful trait design. Deferring for now.
